name: Live Cat Viewer
body:
# Live Cat Viewer - Kitten Academy

![kitten-academy-logo](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/748770/19622191/0fe886c8-989c-11e6-832f-93465aff0c7d.png)
A live stream viewer created for viewing the kitten academy live-stream. I created this because I was really enjoying the kitten academy live stream, additionally I can't have cats in my apartment; this really is the next best thing.

This software was made in a very short period of time, expect bugs, report them.

Should you just want a link to their stream, watch here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YPv9yKC76hE

I strongly encourage you to donate to them; if you like my software, donate to them:

http://kitten.academy/donations/

## This software was built freely, with permission:
http://kitten.academy/

The application is not officially sponsored by Kitten Academy.

The project is licensed in this way:
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

The licence file is in the project, and supplied in all the builds.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
